ti:edition.ti:label: De Lege Agraria
ti:edition.ti:description: Cicero. M. Tulli Ciceronis. Orationes, Vol. IV. Clark, Albert Curtis, editor. Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1909.

ti:translation.ti:label: On the Agrarian Law
ti:translation.ti:description: The orations of Marcus Tullius Cicero, Vol 2, Three orations on the Agrarian law, the four against Catiline, the orations for Rabirius, Murena, Sulla, Archias, Flaccus, Scaurus, etcCicero, Marcus Tullius, creator; Yonge, Charles Duke, 1812-1891, translator
